abstract: The Day: It is John C. Liu's job to wag his finger at others about keeping their books in order, but now his own finances are raising eyebrows. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: It is John C. Liu's job to wag his finger at others about keeping their books in order, but now his own finances are raising eyebrows. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
lead_paragraph: If for some bizarre reason you want your eyes to go out of focus, look up Section 10-119 of the city's Administrative Code.
